input.sentences: we prepared for the graduation ceremony to start .
many students gathered in the hall .
they walked on the road as one .
the valedictorian made a great speech towards the students .
lastly | students threw their caps in the air to celebrate .
output.sentences: On the big day, the students start to get prepared for the graduation ceremony.
All the students have gathered in the great hall to get organized.
Following the school tradition, the students lined up and walked down the road to the ceremony site.
The valedictorian and several other students gave a speech to the crowd.
Lastly, the newly graduated students threw their caps in the air to celebrate.
